angular.funFact: Originally, the rewrite of AngularJS was called 'Angular 2' by the team, but this led to confusion among developers.
angular.description: Angular is a TypeScript-based open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations.

java.funFact: In one year Java gets downloaded one billion times.
java.description: Java is a general-purpose programming language that is class-based, object-oriented, and designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

C.funFact: C is the only language that exists for the longest period of time in computer programming history.
C.description: C is a general-purpose, procedural computer programming language supporting structured programming, lexical variable scope, and recursion, while a static type system prevents unintended operations.

python.funFact: According to the creator Guido Van Rossum, the name of this language was derived from the British comedy series 'Monty Python's Flying Circus'.
python.description: Python is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming languages.
